author: Associated Press
title: 2nd coronavirus vaccine trial begins in the U.S., with a pinch and a zap
description: When will a coronavirus vaccine be available? Researchers have started a safety trial on a second vaccine candidate. A vaccine is still months away.
content:
WASHINGTON U.S. researchers have opened another safety test of an experimental COVID-19 vaccine, this one using a skin-deep shot instead of the usual deeper jab.
The pinch should feel like a simple skin test, a researcher told the volunteer lying on an exam … [+2937 chars]
